properties.description: Curated table for IMS_Ropa data for PBI reports

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                 FROM    sys.schemas
                 WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
     EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
 GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR IMS ROPA--

 CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_mipins_IMS_ROPA
 AS


SELECT 
	CASE WHEN ROPAID = 'No Info'
         THEN IMSROPAID
         ELSE ROPAID
    END                                                                                             AS [ropa_id],
    ROPAName                                                                                        AS [ropa_name],
    ROPAType                                                                                        AS [type],
    ROPAStatus                                                                                      AS [status],
    ROPAPriority                                                                                    AS [priority],
    REPLACE(ROPAOrganisationAreas, '^', '')                                                         AS [organisation_areas_c],
    REPLACE(ROPADataControllers, '^', '')                                                           AS [data_controllers_c],
    ROPAJointController                                                                             AS [joint_controller_c],
    ROPACategoriesPersonalData                                                                    AS [categories_of_personal_data_c],
    ROPACategoriesRecipients                                                                      AS [categories_of_recipients_c],
    ROPASecurityMeasures                                                                            AS [security_measures_c],

    CASE REPLACE(ThirdCountryNames, '^', '') 
        WHEN '' THEN NULL 
        ELSE REPLACE(ThirdCountryNames, '^', '') 
    END                                                                                             AS [third_country_names_c],

    ThirdCountrySafeguards                                                                          AS [third_country_safeguards_c],
    ROPALegitimateInterest                                                                          AS [legitimate_interest_c],
    ISNULL(ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking, '')                                                         AS [automated_decision_making_c], 
    ROPADataSource                                                                                  AS [data_source_c],
    ROPARecordsOfConsent                                                                            AS [records_of_consent_c],
    ROPADataLocation                                                                                AS [location_of_data_c],
    ISNULL(DPIARequired, '')                                                                        AS [dpia_required_c],
    ISNULL(DPIAStatus,'')                                                                           AS [dpia_status_c],
    ROPARetentionPolicy                                                                             AS [retention_policy_c],
    ISNULL(ROPARetentionPolicyApplied, '')                                                          AS [retention_policy_applied_c],
    ROPADataBreachRecord                                                                            AS [data_breach_record_c],
    ROPARetentionNotAdhered                                                                         AS [retention_not_adhered_c],
    ROPAPrivacyNote                                                                                 AS [privacy_notice_c],

	CASE REPLACE(ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp, '^', '') 
        WHEN '' THEN NULL 
        ELSE REPLACE(ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp, '^', '') 
    END                                                                                             AS [categories_of_individuals_c],

    ROPARetentionSchedule                                                                           AS [retention_schedule],
    ISNULL(ROPABusinessFunction,'')                                                                 AS business_function,
    ROPADPO                                                                                         AS [dpo],
    ISNULL(ROPADataBreachOcurred,'')                                                                AS [data_breach_occurred_c],
    ROPALastCurrentAccurateData                                                                     AS [last_current_and_accurate_da_c],

	CASE GDPRLawfulBasis 
        WHEN '^^' THEN NULL 
        ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(GDPRLawfulBasis, '^^', ','), '^', '') 
    END                                                                                             AS [gdpr_lawful_basis_ms_c],

	CASE GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions 
        WHEN '^^' THEN NULL 
        ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions, '^^', ','), '^', '') 
    END                                                                                             AS [gdpr_special_cat_condition_m_c],

	CASE DPA2018Schedule1Condition 
        WHEN '^^' THEN NULL 
        ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(DPA2018Schedule1Condition, '^^', ','), '^', '') 
        END                                                                                         AS [dpa_2018_sch1_condition_ms_c],

    BusinessFunctioinUnstructured                                                                   AS [business_function_unstructured],
    BDCEntityTemp                                                                                   AS [bdc_entity_temp_c],
    ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp                                                                   AS [cat_of_individuals_temp_c],
    DocumentsIMSROPA                                                                                AS [ims_ropa_documents],
    EstimatedNumberOperator                                                                         AS [estimated_number_of_operator_c],
    REPLACE(ROPAInformationOwner, ''', '''')                                                   AS [information_owner_c],
    REPLACE(ROPAInformationExpert, ''', '''')                                                  AS information_expert_c,
	DateEntered                                                                                     AS [date_modified]
  
FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[ims_ropa_dim]
WHERE DateEntered IS NOT NULL
